publications.name: CLEM-Reg: An automated point cloud based registration algorithm for correlative light and volume electron microscopy
publications.summary: Correlative light and volume electron microscopy (vCLEM) allows visualization of fluorescently labeled proteins within their ultrastructural context, but the manual alignment process can be slow and biased. CLEM-Reg is an automated, deep learning-based workflow that aligns vCLEM datasets with near-expert accuracy, and its resources, including datasets and a napari plugin, are publicly available for further development and use.

publications.name: napari: A Multidimensional Image Viewer for Python. A guide to some of the key concepts of napari
publications.summary: Napari is an open-source, Python-based tool for high-performance visualization, annotation, and analysis of large multidimensional images, with extensive plugin support for handling diverse imaging data types.
